column4: if i want to enable this ppa: https://launchpad.net/~gstreamer-developers/+archive/ppa   Should i just enter  deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/gstreamer-developers/ppa/ubuntu  and  deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/gstreamer-developers/ppa/ubuntu    into repo sources and then im done?
